meanings.definition: Kiwis: a small flightless bird native to New Zealand.
meanings.sent1: The kiwis in the zoo are very cute and fluffy.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of kiwis waddling around in the forest.
meanings.sent3: Why did the kiwis refuse to fly south for the winter?
meanings.sent4: The kiwis in the sanctuary were like little earthbound clouds.
meanings.sent5: The endangered kiwis need our protection to thrive in the wild.

meanings.definition: Kiwis: a fruit with brown fuzzy skin and green flesh.
meanings.sent1: I love eating kiwis for breakfast; they are so juicy and sweet.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a sale on kiwis, so I bought a bunch.
meanings.sent3: Why did the kiwis wear tiny sweaters in the fruit bowl?
meanings.sent4: The kiwis in the fruit salad added a burst of color and flavor.
meanings.sent5: The ripe kiwis at the market smelled fresh and inviting.
